title: What is Universality in LLMs? How to Find Universal Neurons

reactions: ) Operator takeaway: Use Pearson correlation (e.g., threshold >0.5) to identify universal neurons between independently trained transformers, as shown in the toy experiment’s excess correlation analysis.
) Skeptic check: The method’s reliance on random rotations as a baseline may not fully account for structural biases in transformer architectures, risking false positives.
